topic: What’s the most memorable moment from your school days?
Who was your favorite teacher, and why?
What’s a funny or embarrassing moment you remember from school?
If you could go back to one day in school, which day would it be and why?
What was your least favorite subject, and how did you cope with it?
If you were a teacher, what subject would you teach and why?
Design your dream classroom—what would it look like?
If your school life was turned into a movie, what would it be called?
Imagine you’re back in school today. How would you handle things differently?
If you could create a new subject for schools, what would it be?
What’s one lesson you learned in school that has stuck with you for life?
How did school shape who you are today?
Share a time you overcame a challenge as a student.
What advice would you give to your younger self on your first day of school?
What’s the most important thing school didn’t teach you that you had to learn later?
If you could bring one thing from your childhood lunchbox to work, what would it be?
Which school event or tradition did you look forward to the most?
What was your go-to excuse for not doing homework?
Share your funniest or most creative science fair project idea.
What’s the one school uniform rule or dress code you wish you could’ve changed?
